description: All PFC skills distributed as sealed artifacts via pfc-release.yml. These skills are executable but not editable in PFI triad repos — protected by guard-core.yml.

sealedSkills.name: close-out
sealedSkills.description: Post-change housekeeping pipeline — issue close-out, architecture docs, operating guides, test plans, bulletins, deployment requirements. Supports PR, story, feature, commit, and session entry points.

sealedSkills.name: create-epic
sealedSkills.description: Creates a correctly-formatted Epic issue with auto-detected numbering, labels, and project board integration.

sealedSkills.name: create-feature
sealedSkills.description: Creates a correctly-formatted Feature issue linked to a parent Epic.

sealedSkills.name: create-story
sealedSkills.description: Creates a correctly-formatted Story issue linked to a parent Feature.

sealedSkills.name: review-hierarchy
sealedSkills.description: Audits a GitHub repository for Azlan workflow compliance — naming conventions, labels, parent references, project board assignment.

sealedSkills.name: setup-project-board
sealedSkills.description: Creates or configures a GitHub Projects v2 board with standard Azlan workflow fields and views.

sealedSkills.name: setup-repo
sealedSkills.description: Provisions a GitHub repository with the full Azlan workflow — labels, branch protection, and project board.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-org-context
sealedSkills.description: Establishes organizational context — products, brands, competitive landscape, market context, and maturity assessment.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-macro-analysis
sealedSkills.description: PESTEL analysis and scenario planning providing 5-10 year macro-environment context for VE strategy formulation.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-industry-analysis
sealedSkills.description: Porter's Five Forces, SWOT/TOWS, and Ansoff growth matrix for competitive environment context.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-vsom
sealedSkills.description: Vision-Strategy-Objectives-Metrics formulation with Balanced Scorecard strategy mapping.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-okr
sealedSkills.description: Cascades VSOM strategic objectives into quarterly OKRs with 2-5 key results each.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-kpi
sealedSkills.description: Defines KPIs with formulas, thresholds, data sources, and BSC perspective classification.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-vp
sealedSkills.description: Builds a complete Value Proposition for a given ICP with mandatory VP-RRR alignment.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-kano
sealedSkills.description: Kano satisfaction analysis — classifies VP features by 5 categories with decay tracking and PMF signal enrichment.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-efs
sealedSkills.description: Generates PRDs with Epic-Feature-Story hierarchies from Terms of Reference and VSOM context.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-ve-pipeline
sealedSkills.description: Master orchestrator for the VE process chain — sequences 7 skills from org-context through value proposition.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-scope
sealedSkills.description: Phase 1 (Discover) of DELTA — scopes discovery engagement, stakeholder mapping, context layer identification.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-evaluate
sealedSkills.description: Phase 2 (Evaluate) of DELTA — Comparative Gap Analysis engine, scores current vs future state.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-leverage
sealedSkills.description: Phase 3 (Leverage) of DELTA — sensitivity analysis, hypothesis testing, impact-effort prioritisation.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-narrate
sealedSkills.description: Phase 4 (Transform) of DELTA — client-facing narrative generation using VE-SC communication patterns.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-adapt
sealedSkills.description: Phase 5 (Adapt) of DELTA — variance analysis, threshold breach detection, cycle determination.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-delta-pipeline
sealedSkills.description: Master orchestrator for DELTA 5-phase discovery process — sequences scope, evaluate, leverage, narrate, adapt.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-reason
sealedSkills.description: MECE decomposition, logic tree analysis, hypothesis testing, and synthesis. Cross-cutting reasoning substrate.

sealedSkills.name: pfc-oaa-v7
sealedSkills.description: Ontology Architect Agent v7.1 — creates, converts, and validates OAA v7.0.0 compliant ontologies.

categories.lifecycle: Issue management, repo setup, compliance auditing, and close-out
categories.ve-pipeline: Value Engineering process chain — org-context through value proposition
categories.delta-pipeline: DELTA 5-phase discovery and gap analysis process
categories.plugin: Non-user-invocable plugins called by other skills
